entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
